dimensions.label: Value Alignment
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach alignment with your values?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize alignment with your core values, even if it means making difficult choices.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and adjust their approach as needed to maintain value alignment.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on data and evidence to inform their decision-making process.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on their gut feeling.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, without hesitation or reserve.
Your FarTwin will maintain a neutral expression and avoid showing emotions in public.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a strong and assertive approach to resolving conflicts, sometimes using force or confrontation.
Your FarTwin will use charm, empathy, and negotiation to resolve conflicts peacefully.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new and challenging experiences, embracing risk as a means to growth.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and prudence when approaching risk, seeking to minimize potential harm.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly social and outgoing, actively seeking to connect with others.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key environments, conserving energy for personal pursuits.

dimensions.label: Creativity Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative endeavors?

options.description: Your FarTwin will embark on new and uncharted territory, pushing boundaries to discover innovative solutions.
Your FarTwin will focus on refining existing ideas and techniques, honing their skills through practice and dedication.

dimensions.label: Responsibility Attitude
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take their commitments seriously, prioritizing accountability and reliability.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their approach as needed to maintain a sense of responsibility.

dimensions.label: Emotional Support
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin provide emotional support?

options.description: Your FarTwin will offer genuine and heartfelt empathy, actively listening to understand the needs of others.
Your FarTwin will focus on providing tangible support and resources, rather than emotional reassurance.
